concept.title: What is Multiplication?
concept.shortdesc: This topic introduces the concept of multiplication.

conbody.p: Multiplication is known as repeated addition. It denoted by ‘×’. It also combines with two or more values to result in one single value. The multiplication process involves the multiplicand and the multiplier. The result of the multiplication of the multiplicand and the multiplier is called the product.

ul.li: The product of two positive integers is a positive integer
The product of two negative integers is a positive integer
The product of a positive and a negative integer is a negative integer
